messages: I am Guybrush Threepwood, mighty pirate
You fight like a dairy farmer
How appropriate. You fight like a cow.
Look behind you, a Three-Headed Monkey!
I'm selling these fine leather jackets.
I'm selling these fine dog jackets.
This's the second biggest chat I’ve ever seen!
This's the second biggest parrot I’ve ever seen!
I must have left it in my other pants
I wanna be a pirate!
So you want to be a pirate, eh? You look more like a flooring inspector.
So you want to be a pirate, eh? You look more like a cow.
Guybrush Threepwood? That's the most ridiculous name I’ve ever heard!
LeChuck? He's the guy that went to the Governor's for dinner and never wanted to leave. He fell for her in a big way, but she told him to drop dead. So he did. Then things really got ugly
You’ve got to help me! I’m a victim of society!
Not to mention halitosis. Yuck!
I could really use a breath mint.
I think I can live without that particular piece of junk.
Say, does your wife know you’re such a cheapskate?
Please? Pretty please? Please pretty please with sugar on top?
That’s the second biggest monkey head I’ve ever seen!
Ah, there’s nothing like the hot winds of Hell blowing in your face
You've got a real attitude problem!
Well...you've got a real hair problem!
You just don't know when to quit, do you?
I’m looking for 30 dead guys and one woman
Never pay more than 20 bucks for a computer game
I don't know. I have no idea why I said that
I'm sensing a disturbance in the Force…as if a tiny voice just called out...and hastily scratched a message in a table
I'm on a whole new adventure
Growing a mustache?
No. Bigger than that.
I’m a game warden. I’ll have to confiscate your pole
Let’s see your badge
You don’t need to see no stinking Badge
How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
But if a woodchuck could chuck and would chuck some amount of wood, what amount of wood would a woodchuck chuck?
Even if a woodchuck could chuck wood and even if a woodchuck would chuck wood, should a woodchuck chuck wood?
A woodchuck should chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood, as long as a woodchuck would chuck wood.
Shut up!
Is Guybrush a French name?
I-- --am your brother!
Search your feelings, you KNOW it to be true!
Darn yer riddles, ya saucy female! What d’ya mean?
Madre de Dios! es el Pollo Diablo!
